system.effect: Designed for Space Marines, those that aren't suffer -20 to use if they don't have Unnatural Strength(4+). Ranged Weapons also count as one size larger (Pistol->Basic->Heavy->Still Heavy), whilst one-handed Melee weapons need two hands, and can't wield two-handed (HB - Size: Hulking+ solves this).
